mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, bi.* from (select * from bookinfo order by bi_rdate desc) bi) where rn between 1 and 4
select count(*) from bs_event where image = #{image}
mapper.insert: insert into bs_event values (bs_event_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{url}, #{image}, to_date(#{startdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{enddate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: select rn, num, title, url, image, to_char(startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, to_char(enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate from (select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from bs_event order by num desc) e) where rn between #{liststart} and #{listend}
select rn, title, url, image from ( select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from bs_event where startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate) e) where rn <= 7
select count(*) from ( select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from bs_event where startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate) e) where rn <= 7
select count(*) from bookcart where userid=#{userid}
select count(p_bnum) as cnt, p_bnum from purchasedetail group by p_bnum order by cnt desc
select * from (select rownum rn, r.* from bsreply r order by r_datetime) where rn between 1 and 2;
